subject: Art & Design
title: Sound Branding: The Audio Logo
description: A quick win: understand Sound Branding: The Audio Logo.

hook.text: You hear five notes and think Intel. Three seconds of audio can be as recognizable as any visual logo.

buildup.text: Sound branding creates audio identities: jingles, sonic logos, and brand sounds that trigger instant recognition.

discovery.text: Netflix's 'ta-dum' was designed to feel like a deep breath before a movie. It cost nothing but is worth billions.

twist.text: Most brands invest millions in visual identity but ignore sound. In podcasts and voice assistants, silence is a risk.

climax.text: Mastercard created a full sonic identity: a melody adapted across genres and cultures but always recognizable.

punchline.text: A brand you can hear is a brand you can't forget.

quiz.question: What is a sonic logo?
options: A short audio signature that identifies a brand instantly
A logo designed using sound wave imagery
